text:
[Verse]
Moonlit night so clear
Stars above we steer
Hearts begin to cheer
Magic in the air

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on the sand
Side by side we stand
Take my trembling hand
Dreams are close and grand

[Chorus]
We'll dance in the moonlight
Shadows come alive tonight
Twirl around till daylight
In this dance we feel just right

[Verse 3]
Waves that kiss the shore
Dance just a little more
Every moment we adore
Love forever we'll explore

[Chorus]
We'll dance in the moonlight
Shadows come alive tonight
Twirl around till daylight
In this dance we feel just right

[Bridge]
Sky is ours above
We're dancing in our love
Stars that never fall
In this world we have it all
title: Moonlit Dance
